title: Every Day Sound Pack Vol.1
description: Every day sounds - the kind you'll encounter everyday and everywhere.
longDescription:
The Every Day Sound Pack, Vol.1


Sample Video:



https://youtu.be/TSQvLvPB_4k

Hi Everyone,


This is our first sound pack, designed and recorded by our dear colleague Ralf Stoecklmayer, featuring a total of 360+ sound files. We're not giving you any fireworks, no Hollywood-boom or sci-fi-stuff with this pack; it's down-to-earth, realistic sound material that you'll encounter pretty much every day in your office, home or vacation environment.


From reading, opening and closing books, walking across ancient floor boards, pouring a drink, opening zippers at all speeds, over trashing or ripping paper to opening soda cans, typing on your keyboard and sharpening knives - we're offering a lot of individual sounds, all of them cleanly and properly recorded and cut to ideal length. Don't expect full-blown-FPS- sound samples; just a hands-on, realistic, simple sound library that you will otherwise spend a lot of time creating on your own, searching on the internet and having to bring into the engine yourself.


Give it a try!


Full list of sound types included:

  • Book sounds (opening, scratching, turning pages, closing)
  • Can sounds (opening, twisting, trashing)
  • Coins (very small coins moved in various ways)
  • Floor sounds (floorboards in many variations, including footsteps, quick turns, slow creaking noises)
  • Sounds of empty and filled wine glasses
  • Gong sound variations
  • Clapping hands in many variations
  • Head scratching sounds
  • Keyboard strokes in several variations
  • Knife sounds (knife on knife, knife on metal)
  • Measuring - and other tape sounds.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  367 Individual Sound Files in 16-bit, 44.1 KHz format.
  • Set up with randomized Sound Cue files within UE4.
  • Featuring Every-Day sounds that you'll encounter in your daily lives.
  •  High quality, noise-free recordings; no popping, no distortion, no lengthy interruptions.
  •  Saving you a lot of time that you can spend on finishing your project.
  • Lots of variations for each individual group of sounds.


Number of Audio Waves: 367

Number of Audio Cues: 39

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5-8 in total.

Supported Development Platforms: PC

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC, Mobile, VR; Macintosh available on request.
